alert.note: Alert for Ozaukee; Sheboygan (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 4:54PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Ozaukee and southeastern Sheboygan Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 454 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cedar Grove, or 10 miles north of Port Washington, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oostburg, Belgium, Cedar Grove, and Harrington Beach St Park. This includes Interstate 43 between mile markers 107 and 117. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
